name: swbatch
label: swbatch v0.3.1 (geopsy v2.10.1)
shortDescription: swbatch allows for the batch inversion of surface wave dispersion data using the dinver module of geopsy.
longDescription: swbatch v0.3.1 executes on a single node of the Stampede2 cluster. swbatch v0.3.1 uses geopsy v2.10.1 as its inversion engine, therefore all .target and .param inversion input files must be created with a compatible version of geopsy. The best way to ensure compatible input files is to use the example inversion workflow provided with the latest version of the open-source Python package swprepost.

details.label: Working Directory
details.description: The directory containing the target (i.e., 0_targets) and parameter (i.e., 1_parameters) directories, see documentation for details. If using the portal interface (i.e., not using Jupyter) you can drag the link for the directory from the Data Depot Browser on the left, or click the 'Select' button to select the desired directory.

details.label: Analysis name
details.description: Analysis name that is brief, memorable, and descriptive. Each output file will begin with this string of characters. No spaces or special characters are permitted.

details.label: Number of inversion trials
details.description: Number (positive integer) of inversion trials to perform per parameterization. (3 is recommended)

details.label: Number of iterations
details.description: Number (positive integer) of Neighborhood-Algorithm iterations to perform per inversion. (250 is recommended)

details.label: Number of initial random samples
details.description: Number (positive integer) of randomly sampled profiles to attempt before the first Neighborhood-Algorithm iteration. (10000 is recommended)

details.label: Number of profiles to consider when resampling
details.description: Number (positive integer) of best profiles to consider when resampling. (100 is recommended)

details.label: Number of profiles per iteration
details.description: Number (positive integer) of new profiles to consider per Neighborhood-Algorithm iteration. (200 is recommended)

details.label: Number of ground models/dispersion curves/ellipticity curves to export
details.description: Number (positive integer) of ground models/dispersion curves/ellipticity curves to export. (100 is recommended)

details.label: Number of Rayleigh wave modes to export
details.description: Number (positive integer) of Rayleigh wave modes to export. If no dispersion curves are desired set both the number of Rayleigh and Love modes to 0. (1 is recommended)

details.label: Number of Love wave modes to export
details.description: Number (positive integer) of Love wave modes to export. If no dispersion curves are desired set both the number of Rayleigh and Love modes to 0. (1 is recommended)

details.label: Minimum frequency of exported dispersion curve(s) in Hz
details.description: Number (positive float) for minimum frequency of exported dispersion curve(s) in Hz. Selecting a value slightly less than the minimum frequency of your experimental dispersion data is recommended.

details.label: Maximum frequency of exported dispersion curve(s) in Hz
details.description: Number (positive float) for maximum frequency of exported dispersion curve(s) in Hz. Selecting a value slightly larger than the maximum frequency of your experimental dispersion data is recommended.

details.label: Number of frequency points in exported dispersion curve(s)
details.description: Number (positive integer) of frequency points in the exported dispersion curve(s). (30 is recommended)

details.label: Number of Rayleigh modes to include in exported ellipticity
details.description: Number (positive integer) of Rayleigh modes to include in exported ellipticity. If no ellipticity curves are desired set this value to 0. (1 is recommended)

details.label: Minimum frequency of exported Rayleigh wave ellipticity in Hz
details.description: Number (positive float) for minimum frequency of exported Rayleigh wave ellipticity curve(s) in Hz. Selecting a value less than the site's resonant frequency is recommended.

details.label: Maximum frequency of exported Rayleigh wave ellipticity curve(s) in Hz
details.description: Number (positive float) for maximum frequency of exported Rayleigh wave ellipticity curve(s) in Hz. Selecting a value greater than the site's resonant frequency is recommended.

details.label: Number of frequency points in exported Rayleigh wave ellipticity curve(s)
details.description: Number (positive integer) of frequency points in exported Rayleigh wave ellipticity curve(s). (64 is recommended)
